pullRequest.title: [JENKINS-61178] When defining an extra container in a pod template with a custom working dir, it is wrongly used as the node working dir

nodes.bodyText: Is this related, or just a deprecation warning?
I guess you addressed the deprecation while dealing with the remoteFs?
Should the test assert something about /src?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+podTemplate(containers: [
+    containerTemplate(name: 'busybox', image: 'busybox', ttyEnabled: true, command: '/bin/cat', workingDir: '/src')
